all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Go ye out from Babylon. Be ye clean that bear the vessels of the Lord.
Doctrine and Covenants 133:5
Quote of the Day
"Each of us must foster a culture of belonging in the Church that is loving, accepting, and encouraging."
Elder Scott D. Whiting | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
